column5: I am looking for someone who does quality rod repair in or around hamilton/burlington.  I have two St.croix musky rods that need some eyelets repaired. Your references would be appreciated!
Send a PM to OFC member Spiel, he's Hamilton based and does excellent work.
Cuzza   checked out your groups HAFFTW website  very nice
I do believe you mean,,,,,,,,,,, SPIEL   x 100.000.000.000  Don,t let it go to your head bud.LOL
I think Chris (Spiel) may be booked for a couple of months, but hey take your rods down with a case of beer and who knows..
Did someone say "beer."  Shoot me a PM Fishtickler, I'm sure I can fix you up.
